about_the_game:
Brendon's Water Polo is where we celebrate Water Polo hitting a yellow ball back and forth until one player manages to get past their opponent. First to seven points wins!

Features:
  • New background music
  • 1-player mode
  • Local multiplayer
  • Smooth animations
  • Large resolution 1024 x 768 px
  • 3D prerendered backgrounds

Brendon is playable in 2-player mode on the left side of the screen. While Tryan is played on the opposing team.
Speed of the ball increases the longer the round is playing to challenge players!

Brendon is playable in 2-player mode on the left side of the screen. While Tryan is played on the opposing team.
Speed of the ball increases the longer the round is playing to challenge players!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Linux 13.0 or newer
  • Processor: Intel(R) ARM x64 bit only, 1.0 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) Internal Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek(R) Audio

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7.3 (Lion) or above
  • Processor: Intel(R) ARM x64 bit only, 1.0 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) Internal Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek(R) Audio

name: Brendon's Water Polo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Vista, 7, 8, Windows 10, Windows 11 or newer
  • Processor: Intel(R) ARM x64 bit, 1.0 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) Internal Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek(R) Audio
  • VR Support: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11 or newer
  • Processor: Intel(R) ARM x64-bit , 2.9 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek(R) Audio
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: Where we celebrate the action-packed Water Polo sport, hitting a yellow ball back and forth until one player manages to get past their opponent. First to seven points wins!
